scripts.aws-us: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name GenieXSLT --zip-file fileb://genie-xslt.zip --profile genie-hub-active  --region us-west-1
scripts.create-us: aws lambda create-function --function-name GenieXSLT --runtime nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://genie-xslt.zip --handler ./build/index.api --profile genie-hub-active --role arn:aws:iam::199352526440:role/genie_renderer --region us-west-1
